Description.Text: The Extras Arent Extra at Drury Hotels. Your great rate includes FREE hot food and cold beverages at the 5:30 Kickback, FREE hot breakfast, FREE wireless Internet access and FREE long distance. Theres something for everyone at Drurys 5:30 Kickback. It's a snack for some, meal for others and free for all. The daily rotating menu features a variety of hot food, plus, beer, wine, mixed drinks and soft drinks. Served 5:30-7:00 p.m. nightly. Dont miss the great QUIKSTART breakfast buffet with scrambled eggs, sausage, biscuits and gravy, fresh fruit, bagels, pastries and more. Take advantage of FREE popcorn and soda every evening from 3-10 p.m. as well as the complimentary exercise room, and 24 hour business center. Recreational amenities at Drury include an indoor pool and a spa tub. Drury Hotels are family owned; you can always expect to receive award winning service during your stay. The hotel has a smoke-free policy.

Situated in Orlando's Universal Orlando-International Drive North neighborhood, Drury Inn & Suites Orlando is near Wet N' Wild and Ripley's Believe or Not and just 3 miles from Universal Studios. Sea World and Discovery Cove are also within 5 miles of the hotel.

Deluxe Queen - 2 Queen Beds, non smoking; microwave and refrigerator; 37 inch LCD television; free wireless internet; free hot breakfast; free hot food and cold drinks every evening.
